column4: Hi guys, this issue is got me very confused. Can not get Adobe flash plugin 11.2 r202 to work in Firefox 14.0.1 Ubuntu 12.04. Installed ubuntu-restricted-extras. It looks like it tries to work. I even went the extreme in wiping the hard drive and starting from scratch. Still not working. :/
have you tried the FF addon flashaid, strange that it does not work though in general.
flashaid will install the release or the beta as of whats available as of now.
